title: The Dow Rose 74 Points Because Momentum Stocks Have Lost Some Mojo
text: Losing Momentum. U.S. stocks had a mixed performance on Tuesday. Treasury yields recovered, momentum stocks sold off, and value stocks rose. Apple stock (ticker: AAPL) ended flat after the company announced its new iPhone 11. Ford Motor stock (F) tumbled after credit-ratings firm Moody’s downgraded the auto maker’s bonds to junk status. Uber Technologies (UBER) and Lyft (LYFT) jumped despite a pending California bill that would classify ride-share drivers as employees. The initial public offering of WeWork’s parent company is in question after the valuation was slashed and its biggest outside investor raised concerns....
description: Stocks had a mixed performance on Tuesday. Treasury yields recovered, momentum stocks sold off, and value stocks rose. Apple ended flat after the company announced its new iPhone 11. Ford tumbled after its bonds were downgraded to junk status.
